level.heading: Liability.
level.text: Present, future, and former District of Columbia Retirement Board members and employees shall be indemnified by the District of Columbia from all claims and liability, including court costs and attorney's fees, because of any action taken pursuant to this part.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-337
level.text: For Law 17-337, see notes following ยง 1-336.01.
